Class XMLScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.hm.cs.rs.compiler.toys.base.BaseScanner
      • edu.hm.cs.rs.compiler.toys.compiler.example.XMLScanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scanner

    public class XMLScanner
extends BaseScanner
    DFA-basierter Scanner fuer einfache, XML-artige Sprache. Syntax: document := element element := "open" content* "close" | "empty" content := element | "text" | "whitespace" Tokendefinitionen: open close empty text p+ whitespace w+
